transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ya mobile se baat kar rahe hain sir. Kya aapki ek complaint receive hui thi IndiaMART se ki aapko buyleads nahi mil rahi hai, right?
Customer: Barabar hai.
Executive: Abhi sir ek bar check karo, abhi buyleads aapko mil rahi hai ya nahi mil rahi hai?
Customer: Nahi mil rahi hai na.
Executive: Sir, main dekh pa rahi hu buyleads aa rahi hai. Aap mujhe ye batao aap all India mein buyleads dekh rahe ho ya apne preferred cities mein?
Customer: Preferred mein dekh raha hu.
Executive: Preferred cities mein dekh rahe ho. Thik hai, ek minute call pe raho sir. Aapki preferred city kaun si hai sir?
Customer: Kya hua?
Executive: Aapki preferred city kaun si hai?
Customer: Mumbai.
Executive: Mumbai. Ye Jounagarh se nahi dekhte hain aap?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Kyun sir, aapka GST to Jounagarh ka hai, Gujarat ka.
Customer: Barabar hai lekin nahi, main nahi dekh raha hu main Mumbai.
Executive: Aapko Maharashtra ki buyleads chahiye, right?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: To Maharashtra ki kaafi sari leads aapko aa rahi hai sir. Aap mujhe ye bataiye aapka jo mail ID hai, wo aapke paas mobile mein on hai kya? Aur matlab mobile mein hai na?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Thik hai, maine na aapko ek video meet ka link bheja hai sir, WhatsApp pe aapko.
Customer: Filhal mein abhi bahar hu, abhi bike pe aaya hu, abhi bike pe aaya hu.
Executive: Sir, achha abhi bike pe hai. Thik hai, no problem sir, aap kab tak pahuchenge basically?
Customer: Aaa, after 2, 2 baje ke baad.
Executive: Kya bol rahe hain?
Customer: Dopahar ke baad, 2 baje ke baad.
Executive: 2 baje ke baad. Thik hai, main ek bar na 2 baje ke baad aapse baat kar leti hu, then video meet karke isko solve karate hain sir, lekin aap please isko solve karwa dijiyega.
Customer: Chalega, chalega, chalega. Thik hai, thik hai, thik hai. Thank you.
Executive: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads.

- Wants buyleads from Mumbai.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed buyleads are being generated.

- Agreed to schedule a video meet at 2 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 2 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, preferred city, video meet, maharashtra
